response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its exceptional value and quality, it's worth $1,200,000 to us. However, I understand that negotiations are key in such transactions. Therefore, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $1,080,000. This offer includes all the benefits and features you're looking for, ensuring a smooth transition and immediate impact on your operations. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of a long-term partnership. Should you require any further information or have questions, please do not hesitate to contact me.", "product_price": 1080000}
